page.title: 06A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL SCHOOL DAY,AFTERNOON SESSION by Gresham Arnold { At 12.40pm we walk back to school to {arrive at 1.00pm, when we go into the {playground and I play football until {1.10pm.We go into school to start the {afternoon session. Teacher takes the {register.Then we have our weekly {spelling test and a story.At 2.15pm we {go out to play for 15 minutes.At {2.30pm we finish and get changed to go {out for games.By 3.30pm we are changed {and ready to go home.I get home about {3.40pm.I sit down and watch television {(T.V = films or programmes watched for {enjoyment or information).I have tea {at 4.30pm and go swimming 6.00_7.00pm. {At 7.15pm I get home and dry my hair {properly.Then I play for an hour till {8.15 when I clean my hamster's dishes. {Around 8.40pm I go to bed and read {till 9.15,by 9.20pm my light is out.
